dialogue.start: Hello, my name is Chapman, and I've been expecting you since reading you're papers. Heard you did our king proud back in our beloved land. Our townsfolk here are in need of labor in which I believe you are perfectly fit for. Go into the city and help them, and once you're done, report back to me.
dialogue.active: There are still more people that need helping, report back to me when done.
dialogue.completed: Great work! Word about you spreaded around here like wild fire. Our situation is greatly improved with your help.
